text: Federico Pablo Ezequiel Ruiz (born 18 May 1989) is an Argentine football player who plays for Sintrense on loan from Sporting. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Primera B Metropolitana for Deportivo Merlo on 2 September 2014 in a game against Tristán Suárez. He signed with Sporting on 2 June 2016 on the same day as his brother Alan. He was sent on loan to the third-tier team Sintrense until the end of the 2016–17 season on 24 August 2016. ==Personal== He is the older brother of Alan Ruiz. ==References== ==External links== Category:1989 births Category:People from Berisso Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers Category:CD Linares players Category:Lucena CF players Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Spain Category:Ontinyent CF players Category:CD Guadalajara (Spain) footballers Category:Gimnasia y Esgrima de La Plata footballers Category:Club Atlético Platense footballers Category:Deportivo Merlo footballers Category:Club Atlético Colón footballers Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Association football midfielders Category:S.U. Sintrense players
title: Federico Ruiz
